sentence.Network_en: Shoes that are too tight deform the feet.
Concrete structures are also usually assumed to deform linearly.
sentence.Network_cn: 混凝土结构通常也假设成线性变形.

sentence.Network_en: In severe cases, it can deform joints and cripple its victims.
sentence.Network_cn: 严重的病例, 可使关节变形,使病人残废.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French desformer, via medieval Latin from Latin deformare, from de- (expressing reversal) + forma 'a shape'

encyclopedia.content: DEFORM是一套基于有限元的工艺仿真系统，用于分析金属成形及其相关工业的各种成形工艺和热处理工艺。通过在计算机上模拟整个加工过程，帮助工程师和设计人员： 设计工具和产品工艺流程，减少昂贵的现场试验成本。 提高工模具设计效率，降低生产和材料成本。缩短新产品的研究开发周期。

entry.tran: （使）变形;（使）成畸形;损毁…的外形
entry.def: If something deforms a person's body or something else, it causes it to have an unnatural shape. In technical English, you can also say that the second thing deforms.

example.tran: 严重的类风湿性关节炎会造成四肢变形。

example.ex: ...the ability of a metal to deform to a new shape without cracking.
example.tran: 金属重新塑形而不断裂的能力

means.word_mean: 2. twist and press out of shape
3. cause (a plastic object) to assume a crooked or angular form;

sentences.sentence: "the strong man could turn an iron bar"

means.word_mean: 5. alter the shape of (something) by stress;
6. assume a different shape or form

auth_sentence.content: Imperative comprehensions, monstrous compulsions of duty which deform.
auth_sentence.res_content: Imperative comprehensions, monstrous compulsions of duty which deform.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Imperative comprehensions, monstrous compulsions of duty which deform.

auth_sentence.content: Sight so deform what heart of rock could long Drie-ey'd behold?

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sight so deform what heart of rock could long Drie-ey'd behold?

auth_sentence.content: The pressure changes deform the overlying rocks, possibly jarring certain faults into action.
auth_sentence.res_content: The pressure changes deform the overlying rocks, possibly jarring certain faults into action.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The pressure changes deform the overlying rocks, possibly jarring certain faults into action.

means.word_mean: 使变形, 使残废;丑化;改变…的外形;损毁…的形状;使成畸形

sentences.en: He was born with a severely deformed foot.
sentences.cn: 他生下来就有一只严重畸形的腿。
